data.message: "Made of 100% recyclable materials", but NOT made of 100% recycled materials?

replies.message: Hi Sean, currently there is 25% recycled plastic in our bottles however, we’re committed to doubling the amount to 50% by 2020. We’d like to use more but there’s not enough recycled plastic in the UK at the moment, we need more bottles recycled.

People don't make the effort because their attention spans only to the immediate.  It doesn't generally allow for the idea that their actions are influenced by others which help create the current global climate, and their actions now can help to improve this climate dog the future.  Corporations and especially MNCs can have a much greater effect than individuals acting off their own bat 🦇.  If you, schools, employers and general structural influence could work towards the three Rs and preservation...
